casebody.data:
GREAT OAKS WATER COMPANY
v.
SANTA CLARA VALLEY WATER DISTRICT. No. S231846. Supreme Court of California March 23, 2016. CANTIL-SAKAUYE, C.J., WERDEGAR, CHIN, CORRIGAN, LIU, and CUÉLLAR, JJ., concur.

The petitions for review are granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in City of San Buenaventura *7v. United Water Conservation District, S226036 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.

KRUGER, J., was absent and did not participate.
